message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is way above my budget. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only offer $10,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer the product to you for $14,000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $14,000 is still a bit above what I can afford.  Would you be willing to accept $12,000?  I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.
I understand that you're trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $13,000, which is a compromise between our previous offers. Let's see if we can make a deal.
Alice, I really appreciate your flexibility. How about we settle at $11,000?  I'm ready to close the deal at this price.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to go down to $12,500, but I don't think I can go any lower than that. This is my final offer, so let's see if we can make a deal.
Alice, I understand you're close to your minimum.  Would you consider $12,000?  It's a fair compromise between our last offers.  If we can agree on this price, I'm ready to purchase right away.
I'm not willing to go back to $12,000, Bob. I think we've been dancing around this price for a while now. I'm willing to meet you at $12,500, but I'm not budging from there. This is my last offer.
